description: Object containing information about foreign income in the received tax calculation.

chargeableOverseasPensionsStateBenefitsR.description: Chargeable overseas pensions and state benefits royalties income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

overseasPensionsStateBenefitsRoyaltiesDe.description: Array containing information about income from overseas pensions, state benefits, and royalties.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

grossIncome.description: Gross income for overseas pensions, state benefits and royalties. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.description: Net income for overseas pensions, state benefits and royalties. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.description: Tax deducted for overseas pensions, state benefits and royalties. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether it's a Foreign Tax Credit Relief. This value must be true or false.

chargeableAllOtherIncomeReceivedWhilstAb.description: Chargeable income received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allOtherIncomeReceivedWhilstAbroadDetail.description: Array detailing all other income received whilst abroad.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

grossIncome.description: Gross income from all other income received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netIncome.description: Net income from all other income received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.description: Tax deducted from all other income received whilst abroad. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether it's a Foreign Tax Credit Relief. The value must be true or false.

overseasIncomeAndGains.description: Object detailing overseas income and gains.

gainAmount.description: Gain from overseas income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalForeignBenefitsAndGifts.description: Total foreign benefits and gifts. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableForeignBenefitsAndGiftsDetail.description: Object detailing chargeable foreign benefits and gifts.

transactionBenefit.description: Amount of transaction benefit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

protectedForeignIncomeSourceBenefit.description: Amount of protected foreign income source benefit. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

protectedForeignIncomeOnwardGift.description: Amount of protected foreign income onward gift. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

benefitReceivedAsASettler.description: Amount of benefit received as a settler. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

onwardGiftReceivedAsASettler.description: Amount of onward gift received as a settler. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
